item.title: Xbox - Project Scorpio
item.description:
Xbox - Project Scorpio

The most powerful console ever. Holiday 2017.

item.title: Xbox One S
item.description:
Xbox One S

Introducing the new Xbox One S. Play the greatest games lineup, including Xbox 360 classics, on a 40% smaller console. Experience richer, more luminous colors in games and video with High Dynamic Range technology. Stream 4K video on Netflix and Amazon Video, and watch UHD Blu-rayâ„¢ movies in stunning 4K Ultra HD.

item.title: Tom Clancy's The Division - Expansion I - Underground Launch Trailer [US]
item.description:
Tom Clancy's The Division - Expansion I - Underground Launch Trailer [US]

In Expansion I, Underground, the factions of New York are regrouping beneath the streets, and planning major new attacks. Navigate randomly generated urban dungeons with up to three friends to take out this new threat and be rewarded with advanced loot.

item.title: 7 Days to Die - Gameplay Trailer "Available Now"
item.description:
7 Days to Die - Gameplay Trailer "Available Now"

7 Days to Die' is an open-world survival game that is a unique combination of first person shooter, survival horror, tower defense, and role-playing games. It presents combat, crafting, looting, mining, exploration, and character growth, in a way that has seen a rapturous response from fans worldwide, generating many thousands of hours of YouTube and other streaming video content.

item.title: Battlefield 1 Squads Q&A
item.description:
Battlefield 1 Squads Q&A

Graeme Boyd, Xbox Live's AceyBongos, sits down with DICE's Daniel Berlin to talk about Battlefield 1. Pre order: http://store.xbox.com/en-US/Xbox-One/Bundle/Battlefield-1-Early-Enlister-Deluxe-Edition/96666dd7-d1cd-48dd-8fbc-50936f39e8a2 For more information: http://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/battlefield-1

item.title: WWE 2K17 Cover Reveal Trailer
item.description:
WWE 2K17 Cover Reveal Trailer

WWE 2K17 arrives as the reigning and defending flagship WWE video game franchise champion with cover Superstar Brock Lesnar! WWE 2K17 features stunning graphics, ultra-authentic gameplay and a massive roster of WWE and NXT's popular Superstars and Legends.

item.title: This Week on Xbox: June 24 , 2016
item.description:
This Week on Xbox: June 24 , 2016

On this week's episode we recap some of best Xbox moments from E3 2016 and what they mean for you.

item.title: MNR 572 After E3 2016 by Larry Hryb (Major Nelson)
item.description:
MNR 572 After E3 2016 by Larry Hryb (Major Nelson)

Larry Hryb, Xbox Major Nelson Gamertag: lollip0p Gamertag: Rubes Behind the scenes at E3 2016 Name The Game And more.

item.title: For Honor Trailer: Story Campaign Cinematic- E3 2016
item.description:
For Honor Trailer: Story Campaign Cinematic- E3 2016

Experience the world of For Honor in this cinematic trailer of the campaign. Playable in solo and two-player co-op, online and split-screen, For Honor's full-fledged story campaign is a tale of warriors in which players will live from the inside a crucial moment in the war amongst knights, Vikings and samurai.

item.title: Tom Clancy's The Division Trailer: Underground DLC - Expansion 1 - E3 2016
item.description:
Tom Clancy's The Division Trailer: Underground DLC - Expansion 1 - E3 2016

In DLC Expansion I: Underground, dive into the underbelly of New York with up to three friends to save what remains. Explore the randomly generated mazes of subways, tunnels, and sewers to fight deadly enemies and recover powerful loot. Experience an all-new incursion and find the latest weapons, gear and more.
